transcript: I thought you had to make a billion dollars a year to be a billionaire real talk I did I never thought about it I just thought a billion dollars a year like I'm so far away and then I was like oh silly Alex that's not how it works it's you make two billion dollars over the course of your life and after taxes you have a billion dollars so I was like okay that seems more doable and then once I understood like how assets are valued and things like that I was like oh you just get a 10x multiple on 100 million and there you go your billionaire
